label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_018
content:
## 2024-07-01 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 124
- Active: 117
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 31
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 7

#### By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 29
- Mid Dose: 31
- High Dose: 32
- Placebo: 32

### Immunogenicity By Group

#### Low Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 72.1
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 17.8
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 115.7
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 164.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 118.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 30.5

#### Mid Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 108.4
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 29.4
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 175.5
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 259.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 192.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 44.5

#### High Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 149.7
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 41.4
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 240.2
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 363.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 249.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 63.8

#### Placebo
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 10.4
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 4.1
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 21.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 39.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 18.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 1.2

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 35.6
- Erythema Percentage: 23.4
- Swelling Percentage: 11.5
- Induration Percentage: 7.7
- Mean Pain Duration (hours): 17.2

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 16.1
- Fatigue Percentage: 28.4
- Myalgia Percentage: 20.3
- Headache Percentage: 25.5
- Chills Percentage: 5.7

### Safety Labs

#### WBC
- Mean (K): 8.7
- SD: 2.0

#### Lymphocyte Percentage
- Mean: 33.9
- SD: 6.1

#### Neutrophil Percentage
- Mean: 55.2
- SD: 8.3

#### Platelets
- Mean (K): 226
- SD: 39

#### CRP
- Mean (mg/L): 2.3
- SD: 0.6

#### Hemoglobin
- Mean (g/dL): 13.8
- SD: 1.3

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1847, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1879, Description: fatigue, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1884, Description: chills, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- DSMB safety review teleconference completed
- Serum sample aliquoting completed for 18 subjects

### Notes
- Week 18: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 124 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
